steps.description: Place-Place 8-inch flour tortilla on cutting board
steps.modified_description: Place-Place 8-inch flour tortilla on a plate

errors.description: Use a plate instead of cutting board.

steps.description: Clean-Clean the knife by wiping it with a paper towel
steps.modified_description: Clean-Clean the kitchen knife by wiping it with a paper towel

errors.description: Use a kitchen knife instead of a buttering knife (might cut the tortilla)

steps.description: scoop-Use the knife to scoop jelly from the jar
steps.modified_description: scoop-Use the knife to scoop jelly from the jar (pierce the jar accidently)

errors.description: Might have cut the jelly bottle with knife

steps.description: Spread-Spread jelly over the nut butter
Clean-Clean the knife by wiping with a paper towel
Roll-Roll the tortilla from one end to the other into a log shape, about 1.5 inches thick. Roll it tight enough to prevent gaps, but not so tight that the filling leaks
steps.modified_description: Roll-Roll the tortilla from one end to the other into a log shape, about 1.5 inches thick. Roll it very tight.

errors.description: Roll it tightly - The jelly spills out

steps.description: Secure-Secure the rolled tortilla by inserting 5 toothpicks about 1 inch apart
steps.modified_description: Secure-Secure the rolled tortilla by inserting 5 toothpicks.

errors.description: The toothpicks are inserted at random places (not 1 inch apart)

steps.description: Trim-Trim the ends of the tortilla roll with the butter knife, leaving 1/2 inch margin between the last toothpick and the end of the roll
steps.modified_description: Trim-Trim the ends of the tortilla roll with the butter knife at the last toothpick

errors.description: No margins are left. The last pinwheels will be very small and toothpicks will be at the ends

steps.description: Slide-Slide floss under the tortilla, perpendicular to the length of the roll
Place-Place the floss halfway between toothpicks
Cross-Cross the floss's two ends over the tortilla roll's top
pull-pull the floss ends in opposite directions to slice
steps.modified_description: Slice the pinwheels using a scissor

errors.description: Use a scissor instead of floss

steps.description: slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
steps.modified_description: Continue cutting with scissors to create 1 more pinwheel

errors.description: Use a scissor instead of floss

steps.description: slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
steps.modified_description: Continue cutting with scissors to create 1 more pinwheel

errors.description: Use a scissor instead of floss

steps.description: slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
steps.modified_description: Continue cutting with scissors to create 1 more pinwheel

errors.description: Use a scissor instead of floss

steps.description: Place-Place the pinwheels on a plate

errors.description: scoop-Use a butter knife to scoop nut butter from the jar
Spread-Spread nut butter onto the tortilla, leaving 1/2-inch uncovered at the edges
